page.title: 10Religion
page.content: Our school is a Church of England school and we go to services at Christ Church Linthwaite about twice a term. We also go there on special occasions such as Christmas.I was confirmed last week.That means being made adult member of the church when you can take communion.The Bishop confirms you by laying his hands on your head and saying,"I confirm you in the name of God." There are also parish churches at Golcar,Slaithwaite,Longwood and Crosland Moor. There are a lot of non-conformist churches in our area-mainly Methodist and baptists.In Milnsbridge there is a Christadelphian meeting hall.
